creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: gofu background; cartoon-like image of standing figure wearing black, blue and green plaid and orange floral garments; yellow ground
markings: 弦七十二品 {Tsuru nanajūni hin} [Seal no. 29]
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Full-length Portraits Series VI "Six Scenes from the Stage" 第六期全身図シリーズ・舞台六景
text: 103rd design by Kōkei. Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō XII (1946-2013) as Umeōmaru 梅王丸 in the scene "Tearing the Carriage Apart" (Kurumabiki 車引) of the play "Mirror of Learning and Transmitting Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy" (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami" 菅原伝授手習鑑), performed at the Kabuki Theater in February of 1988.
title: Actor Ichikawa Danjūrō XII as Umeōmaru
